===Childrenâs Run & Fun Event===
â
+
In 1991, a noncompetitive childrenâs run was added. In 1995 that run was dedicated to the memory of Dick Lytie, an avid runner and Bellin supporter who died in the summer of 1994. Due to itâs popularity and size, the run now takes place on the Friday evening before the Bellin run. It features a Â¼ mile course for kids 6 and under, and a Â½ mile course for kids aged 7-10. In 2010 registration for the childrenâs run was just under 3000 making it a large part of the Bellin Run experience. ===Friday Health Expo===
===Friday Health Expo===
â
+
On the same Friday night before the big race Astor Park plays host to a health expo coordinated by Bellin Health. At the expo there is an all-you-can eat spaghetti dinner, booths filled with many different health themed vendors, and many activities for the kids to participate in. These activities include a large playground, inflatable toys, entertainers, and of course a meet and greet autograph session with the elite athletes.<ref>http://www.bellinrun.com/events/elite-athletes.html</ref><ref>http://pqasb.pqarchiver.com/greenbaypressgazette/access/2056761921.html?FMT=FT&FMTS=ABS:FT&type=current&fmac=e1f2cfd2062a1c51f61c9ef77b415569&date=Jun+12%2C+2010&author=&pub=&desc=KIDS+LEAD+THE+PACK</ref>
â
